name: Datamine FLUX
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: FLUX functions as the native currency of the Datamine Ecosystem and is powered by Datamine (DAM) token. Every 15 seconds you generate a bit of USDc in form of FLUX tokens.
